title: Pride Highlighter
content:
[[iftags +component]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]
[[include :topia:pride-animated-source]]
[[module css]]
@import url("https://nu-scptheme.github.io/Black-Highlighter/stable/styles/normalize.min.css");
@import url("https://nu-scptheme.github.io/Black-Highlighter/stable/styles/black-highlighter.min.css");

:root {
    --logo-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:pride-highlighter/lgbtqp_logo.svg") !important;
}

#page-title {
	text-align: center;
}

h1 {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

div.pridebox,
div.includebox {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

div.pridebox div.insidebox {
	flex-basis: calc((100% / 2) - 0.125rem);
	border: 0.0625rem solid rgb(var(--bright-accent));
	flex-grow: 2;
	min-width: 18.750em;
}

div.insidebox div.imagebox {
	display: flex;
	justify-content: center;
}

div.insidebox div.imagebox > div {
	width: 50%;
	min-width: inherit;
}

div.includebox {
    text-align: center;
}

div.includebox > blockquote {
    flex-basis: calc(50% - 1em);
	flex-grow: 2;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	margin: 0.25em;
	width: calc(50% - 1em);
}

div.includebox tt {
    font-size: 80%;
}

div.pridebox div.insidebox h1, div.pridebox div.insidebox h2 {
	--wght: 900;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-weight: 900;
    padding: 0 1em;
}

#page-content > div.pridebox div.scp-image-block {
    box-shadow: inherit;
    background-color: rgb(var(--very-light-gray-monochrome));
    border: initial;
}

#page-content > div.pridebox div.scp-image-block > a {
    width: 90%;
	padding: 1rem 0;
}

#page-content > div.pridebox div.scp-image-block > div.scp-image-caption {
    border-top: inherit;
}

.flipped {
    display: inline-block;
    transform: scaleX(-1);
}

[[/module]]

+ ðŸŒˆ BHL + BLT + Sigma 9 Pride Logos! [[span class="flipped"]]ðŸŒˆ[[/span]]

> //Disclaimer: This is 100% not endorsed by SCP Staff in any way. I am an SCP Author who has decided to create these for other SCP Authors to use in celebration of Pride month (and beyond if they so choose.)// 

[[=]]
Would you like to add a pride logo to one of your pages?
Well, you've come to the right place! 

++++ //BHL// = [[[theme:black-highlighter-theme|Black Highlighter]]], the theme you are looking at now
++++ //BLT// = [[[theme:basalt|Basalt]]], another alternate theme
++++ //Sigma 9// = Regular, base theme used on the SCP Wiki

Just include this code on your page to add the logo of your choice.
**Both Black Highlighter/Basalt and Sigma 9 Includes are available:**
[[/=]]
